name: Tervas
description: This unique Tervas knife gets its name and color from the resinous stump of a conifer tree. Tervas is warm brown, smells of resin, and is the best material for campfire wood. Hikers can use it to light a fire even in the rain.
The handle of the Tervas knife is made of heat-treated curly birch and reindeer antler. The stunning 10 cm Damascus blade is stainless steel, and the black sheath is made of genuine leather.

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Heat-treated curly birch, reindeer antler bone, colored birch
